thread.title: BRIEF-Federal Mogul Izmit Says Tenneco Signs Agreement To Acquire Federal Mogul Sirketler Group

title: BRIEF-Federal Mogul Izmit Says Tenneco Signs Agreement To Acquire Federal Mogul Sirketler Group

organizations.name: tenneco signs agreement to acquire federal mogul sirketler group
to acquire federal mogul sirketler group reuters

text:
April 11, 2018 / 3:28 PM / Updated 15 minutes ago BRIEF-Federal Mogul Izmit Says Tenneco Signs Agreement To Acquire Federal Mogul Sirketler Group Reuters Staff 
April 11 (Reuters) - FEDERAL MOGUL IZMIT PISTON VE PIM URETIM TESISLERI AS: 
* TENNECO INC SIGNS (NOT SING) AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE FEDERAL MOGUL SIRKETLER GROUP 
* TAKEOVER EXPECTED TO BE CONCLUDED IN SECOND HALF OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
